metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8129 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.0.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds write) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted TIFF image, as demonstrated by failure of tif_next.c to verify thatthe BitsPerSample value is 2, and the t2p_sample_lab_signed_to_unsignedfunction in tiff2pdf.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8129` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2').
